section.title: SenseGroupRelation relation type
section.para: Represents the fact that a group of senses (all belonging to the same entry) should be grouped when presented to a human user. Typically, when an entry has a large number of senses, it is a convenience to the human user to group them into a smaler number of groups by some broad criterion, such as by part of speech or by semantic similarity.

listitem.para: A short statement that indicates the broad meaning that unites the senses in this group and permits their differentiation from other senses in the entry.
